name: Welding Torch (Gas-Powered)
description: A 300 mm long torch good for small repair jobs and spot welding. The acetylene welding torch is fueled by a tank set that contains a fuel tank and an oxygen tank. The torch can be used continuously for approximately 20 minutes depending on the density setting.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
